name: Late-night Nurse Call
description:
Story
Joining you in tonight's festive of indulgence are these angels sullied in black!

"Late-night Nurse Call" is an omnibus drama featuring the characters from ZyX's series, "The Infections at Shiromiya Polyclinic".
We're bringing you an obscene and amorous drama with animations in between that shows the events happening between Dr. Akira Sakaguchi and the nurses and patients around him at the Shiromiya Polyclinic!
Gameplay "Late-night Nurse Call" is a combination of an omnibus drama and an action game featuring the characters from ZyX's game, "The infections at Shiromiya polyclinic".
The main feature of "Late-night Nurse Call" is that it allows the player to enjoy both the drama and the action game parts. Upon selecting the stage, the drama part will be shown.
Once a certain part of the drama has been reached, the player will then be thrusted into the action part of the game.
If the player fulfills the conditions showed at the beginning, he can see the continuation of the drama part.
In a single stage, there will be 2 action parts in between the 3 drama parts.
The flow of events would be as follows:Drama Part A -> Action Part A -> Drama Part B -> Action Part B -> Drama Part CCharactersThese are the girls from "Shiromiya polyclinic" that you could sink yourself into:

Hiroko Sugimura

A nurse that works for Sakaguchi in the polyclinic. She's a capable person who is good friends with Manami Iimura from the pharmaceutical department and takes real good care of her juniors almost to the point of knowing the smallest detail about them. Has quite a nice reputation around the polyclinic.

Kaori Miyama

An intern working in the polyclinic and also the only daughter of the polyclinic's vice director, Miyama Souichirou. Has been friends with Asuka since medical school.

Asuka Shiromiya

The only daughter of the Shiromiya Polyclinic's chief director. She started working as an intern in the polyclinic right after graduating from medical school. One of those refined ladies who doesn't know much about the real world.

Satsuki Orikawa

One of Hiroko Sugimura's juniors who admired her, she joined working in the polyclinic partly because she wanted to chase after her idol.

Emiko Midou

A skilled surgeon working in the polyclinic. She is the one who triggered Sakaguchi and also the first one whom Sakugachi has coerced.

Iimura Manami

A pharmacist working in the polyclinic. While she has a fiance, that just made Sakaguchi jealous and turned her into one of his captive. She's currently making drugs of her own will, providing them and helping out Sakaguchi.

Itsumi Sonoda

A new nurse who started working in the polyclinic. A friend of Orikawa Satsuki ever since they were at the nursing school. With a bright personality, others see here as both healthy and pretty.

Rie Yanahara

The wife of the Dr. Yanahara who works at the polyclic at the same time as Sakuaguchi. With Dr. Yanahara being busy with work, they don't have much time to spend togeher.

Shiori Yoneda

A nurse with lesbian inclination and affectionately calls Rumi as "Onee-sama". While she and Rumi are being transferred, she herself doesn't mind where they may end up as long as they're together.

Chihaya Kuramoto

A former patient of Sakaguchi who was admitted to the polyclinic. She has now been discharged and is now happily attending her school. A cheerful girl who likes engaging herself in sports and in making love.
